com.untamedears.contraptions.gadgets

Class AreaTransferGadget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.untamedears.contraptions.gadgets.AreaTransferGadget

  • public class AreaTransferGadget
extends java.lang.Object
    A gadget which will transfer a resource over time This gadget transfers a resource from a contraption to all of the contraptions surrounding it within a particular radius Format of JSON object should be as follows: 
     {
   "resourceID": "RESOURCE_ID",
   "radius": 1,
   "rate": 1
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • AreaTransferGadget

        public AreaTransferGadget(java.lang.String resourceID,
                  int radius,
                  double rate)
        Creates an AreaTransferGadget
        Parameters:
        resourceID - String representing the resource this effects
        radius - Square radius over which this effects contraptions
        rate - Rate in 1/tick with which resources transfer from this gadget

      • areaTransfer

        public void areaTransfer(Contraption contraption,
                Resource resource,
                int time)
        Transfers a resource from a contraption to surrounding Contraptions
        Parameters:
        contraption - Contraption being transfered from
        resource - Resource being transfered from
        time - # ticks of transfer to occur

      • safeTransfer

        public void safeTransfer(Resource fromResource,
                Resource toResource,
                int amount)
        Transfers from one resource to another with maximums and minimums
        Parameters:
        fromResource - The resource that is being transferred from
        toResource - The resource that is being transferred to
        amount - The amount being transfered
